name: I Love You Freddy
description: She loves you so much, she'd do anything for you, only problem is, she's absolutely nuts! in this satire experience, you play as celebrity actor Freddy who attempts to escape an island your obsessive fan girl trapped you in, in the meantime, your agent attempts to get help from some powerful friends, solve puzzles, fight back, and build your way out of her island, while hearing the miserable, a bit too far flirts from the fan girl.
